website_summaries.verdict: Buyers looking for a floor rack that saves space will find their match in this charming, compact piece.
pros: Designed to fit snugly in any corner, this floor rack efficiently saves space
Comes with a score keeper and drink holders
Attractive color options to complement any room
Buyers love the terrific quality for price
cons: Shorter than most users expected, making the drink holders awkward to use
Does not include a hook for the ball rack

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice item
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a pretty nice item for money. It did have some chips in paint and not sure of sturdiness yet since I am getting cue sticks in a day or to to put in it, but seems fine. Got the all black and I think is was worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce D.

customer_reviews.title: Fan-Freakin-Tastic
customer_reviews.text: Easy to unpack, five minute (no tools) assembly. Looks great and when you put a cue in, the cue stays right there. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: OrionRex

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: It took maybe 5 minutes to assemble. The color is good, it hold all balls & sticks and its small enough to fit in a corner out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: aamatt

customer_reviews.title: Nice budget rack
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty nice corner stand for what it is made of. It isn’t hard wood. It is mdf. Still, it goes together very easily with no tools needed. I wanted functionality at a budget price. That’s exactly what I got. It does the job and I am satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph F. Morrow

customer_reviews.title: love the counters
customer_reviews.text: counters came in handy when the counters on my table went bad
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: The little dips/plates on top are perfect for chalk
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Even though its not a wall mount unit, still saves space by sitting in the corner of the room. The little dips/plates on top are perfect for chalk.
customer_reviews.author: FI

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice stand and easy to put together, it only took about 5 mins.
customer_reviews.author: De'Amber

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I love the finish. The cupholders are much needed. If it were a bit taller, it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected, but meets my temporary needs
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I expected, make sure you check the dimensions. Otherwise went together easily, feels decently study, but over appearance is ehhh..
customer_reviews.author: MattMan808

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice cue rack, delivered on time, assembly with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: H. Volke

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend to store pool table accessories and keeping score of your wins and losses! 😂
customer_reviews.text: We love this and highly recommend it! This is very elegant looking and convenient to store everything for your pool table.
customer_reviews.author: Ly F.

customer_reviews.title: A Good Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product that was easy to assemble and a good price! It looks nice by my pool table.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, easy to put together and very sturdy! Don’t over tighten though!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Holds all my pool cues, balls and racks and fits great in the corner. Easy assembly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality billiards rack. We added longer legs to make taller.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Great rack and perfect addition to our pool room
customer_reviews.text: Great rack and perfect addition to our pool room. It is quite sturdy and fits perfectly in the corner not taking up a lot of space
customer_reviews.author: Susan S.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good price!
customer_reviews.text: This item is exactly that what I was looking for. Quality is good for the price!
customer_reviews.author: UAmazing

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: It looks okay but the score keeping system was in poor shape out of the box. one side works fine but on the other half the numbers are rubbed off and the one wheel is off center and does not turn easy. Look elsewhere for a quality product
customer_reviews.author: Joe Chipriano

customer_reviews.title: Great Rack for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Great Rack for the price! Keep everything organized and doesn't take a lot of space or holes on the walls
customer_reviews.author: tammy

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Fits right in the corner where I ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Fits right in the corner where I wanted it. Easy to install. I did it myself!! Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Would like to see a spot for hanging a triangle but I made one work.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Alan Matsumoto

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Terrible, this product came chipped and dented in multiple areas. Not only that but the score tracker does not line up properly and the whole stand does not sit level. Very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Billiard stick and ball stand
customer_reviews.text: looks very nice adds a touch of class to our room.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Arnett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the space we needed to fill. Well made!
customer_reviews.author: Mary M. Waterbury

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Wish it had a hand for ball rack. Love place for drinks
customer_reviews.author: Delbra

customer_reviews.title: Cue rack
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT as big as shown in the picture - Aprox 24"w x 36"Tall
customer_reviews.author: Tony T

customer_reviews.title: i like it
customer_reviews.text: nice, easy to build and works great for the pool room
customer_reviews.author: dennis elam

customer_reviews.title: Most pool stocks won't fit
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was quicker than expected, easy to assembly, however it won't fit most poo, sticks as the holes are too small.
customer_reviews.author: Bruise

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: It was damaged and I had to return it. The second rack was not damaged. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Reggie Lumpkin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is nice, but not very big. Verify dimensions before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect easy to assemble and it is just the right size
customer_reviews.author: Warman

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Nice addition to the pool room. Sturdy & works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: True Reviewer

product_meta.title: Iszy Billiards Color Black Cue Rack Only - 8 Pool Billiard Stick & Ball Floor Stand with Scorer
product_meta.description: 8 cue and ball floor rack - holds 8 cues and full set of balls - with 4 Score counters - rubber rings for cue holes and 4 rubber pads for beverages - measurements are 22 1/4"H x 14"W x 14"d - Black finish - cues and balls not included - some assembly required
feature_bullets: 8 cue and ball floor rack - holds 8 cues and full set of balls
Rubber rings for cue holes and 4 rubber pads for beverages
Measurements are 22 1/4"H x 14"W x 14"d - Black finish
Cues and balls not included - some assembly required
